description.p: LMMS is a music production application. It allows the creation of loops, synthesizing and mixing sounds, arranging samples having fun with your MIDI-keyboard and much more... It combines the features of a tracker-/sequencer-program and those of powerful synthesizers, samplers, effects etc. in a modern, user-friendly and easy to use graphical user-interface.
